text: On an island like Iceland, no rivers are very long. The most important rivers are: ==South Iceland== *Hvítá *Krossá *Kúðafljót *Markarfljót *Múlakvísl *Ölfusá (the greatest flow of an Icelandic river) *Rangá *Skeiðará *Sog *Þjórsá (the longest river of Iceland, 230 km) *Tungnaá ==West Iceland== *Hvítá (Borgarfjörður) *Norðurá (Borgarfjörður) *Fossá ==Westfjords== *Dynjandi *Staðará (Steingrímsfirði) ==North Iceland== *Blanda *Eyjafjarðará *Eystri Jökulsá *Fnjóská *Glerá *Héraðsvötn *Hörgá *Jökulsá á Fjöllum *Laxá *Norðurá (Skagafjarðarsýsla) *Skjálfandafljót *Vatnsdalur ==East Iceland== *Lagarfljót *Jökulsá á Dal *Jökulsá í Fljótsdal * Iceland Iceland
title: List of rivers of Iceland
